titleStmt.title: The lamentacion of a synner, made by ye most vertuous Ladie, Quene Caterin, bewayling the ignoraunce of her blind life: set furth and put in print at the instaunt desire of the righte gracious ladie Caterin duchesse of Suffolke, [and] the earnest requeste of the right honourable Lord, William Parre, Marquesse of North Hampton
titleStmt.author: Catharine Parr, Queen, consort of Henry VIII, King of England, 1512-1548.
Burghley, William Cecil, Baron, 1520-1598.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete at the signe of the Sunne ouer agaynste the conduyte by Edwarde Whitchurche,
publicationStmt.date: the. v. day of Nouember, in the yere of our Lord. 1547]

notesStmt.note: Preface by William Cecil, Baron Burghley.
Running title reads: The lamentacion of a sinner.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Sunne ouer agaynste the conduyte
